mainBoard.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
mainBoard.originalText:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Venser, Shaper Savant enters, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: If Venser's triggered ability targets a spell cast with flashback, that spell will be exiled instead of returning to its owner's hand.
If a copy of a spell is returned to its owner's hand, it's moved there, then it will cease to exist as a state-based action. It can't be recast.

If a spell is returned to its owner's hand, it's removed from the stack and thus will not resolve. The spell isn't countered; it just no longer exists. This works against a spell that can't be countered.
If Venser's triggered ability targets a spell cast with flashback, that spell will be exiled instead of returning to its owner's hand.
If a copy of a spell is returned to its owner's hand, it's moved there, then it will cease to exist as a state-based action. It can't be recast.

If a spell is returned to its owner's hand, it's removed from the stack and thus will not resolve. The spell isn't countered; it just no longer exists. This works even against a spell that can't be countered.

mainBoard.name: Stinging Lionfish
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.

rulings.text: An ability that triggers when you cast a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
If you have more than one opponent, this ability can trigger once during each of those opponents' turns.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, this ability triggers no more than once during each opposing team's turn.

This ability triggers only on your very first spell during an opponent's turn, not the first spell after the card is on the battlefield. If you cast a spell before it's on the battlefield (including if you cast this card somehow during an opponent's turn), the ability won't trigger.

mainBoard.text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.

foreignData.name: Höchster Wille
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, es sei denn, sein Beherrscher bezahlt {3}.
• Schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Voluntad suprema
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
• Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {3}.
• Mira las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignData.name: Volonté suprême
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Contrecarrez un sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {3}.
• Regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'elles dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignData.name: Volontà Suprema
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {3}.
• Guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignData.name: 至高の意志
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
・呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{3}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。
・あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード４枚を見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

• Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Insel kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Islote floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.
foreignData.name: Île prospère
foreignData.text:
L'Île prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.
foreignData.name: Isola Florida
foreignData.text:
L'Isola Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する島嶼
foreignData.text:
興隆する島嶼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、青でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{U}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
